message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I'm confident it's worth a lot to you. I'm offering it to you for $175. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $120. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer.  While I understand your perspective, I'm unable to accept $120.  I'm willing to come down to $140, which still reflects the value of the product. Let's see if we can find common ground.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose $130 as my counteroffer. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence.  $130 is still a bit too low for me, considering the product's worth. However, I'm eager to make this deal work.  I'm willing to drop to $135. This is my final offer, so let's see if we can come to an agreement.
